location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from William Bruce, Acting Resident at Bushire to Neil Benjamin Edmonstone, Chief Secretary to the Government, Fort William, Calcutta

mods.abstract: The letter is acknowledging the commands of the Bengal Government dated 7 December 1811. In response, it states that Lieutenant Lockett has arrived and departed Bushire for the interior with the permission of Sir Gore Ouseley. It further notes the measures William Bruce has taken to assist the Lieutenant with his endeavours.
